name: Somo and the Turtleship
description: Somo and the Turtleship is the heart warming journey of Somo and his big Friend which is an turtle island. The Game is meant to relax you and provides not much of a challenge. It is much more an happy cute experience in which you keep the inner fire of the turtle running and your environment clean. The Game was developed within the itch.io friendship game jam and was created by Annika Handtke, Clara Müller and Markus Werner (Team KFC). Sound was composed for this game by Leon Arndt.
